Authorities won’t disclose penalties, if at all, for supermarkets breaching Easter trading laws for third time in four years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/authorities-wont-disclose-penalties-if-at-all-for-supermarkets-breaching-easter-trading-laws-for-third-time-in-four-年/A7Q3PBMU4RDYVKH6GYIZMT736I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/authorities-wont-disclose-penalties-if-at-all-for-supermarkets-breaching-easter-trading-laws-for-third-time-in-four-年/A7Q3PBMU4RDYVKH6GYIZMT736I/ Ben TomsettThe supermarkets involved will not disclose their earnings over the weekend. Tue, 02 Apr 2024 03:42:10 +0000 Almost all shops across the country were required to close on Good Friday and Easter Sunday. Photo / Richard Robinson
Department of Internal Affairs-led operation uncovers ‘criminal network’ of scammers, scam reporting down significantly https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-internal-affairs-led-operation-uncovers-criminal-network-of-scammers-scam-reporting-down-significantly/LSMF3XHI4ZEMPKVXJPBJWBIUPU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-internal-affairs-led-operation-uncovers-criminal-network-of-scammers-scam-reporting-down-significantly/LSMF3XHI4ZEMPKVXJPBJWBIUPU/ There was an 83 per cent decrease in people reporting text scams during the operation. Tue, 02 Apr 2024 03:35:55 +0000 The seven month scam disruption operation from May last year comprised 12 search warrants, in which the DIA seized over 4000 items being used by scammers. Photo / 123rf
